text: The Hyundai Nexo is a Hydrogen Fuel cell Crossover SUV made by Hyundai since 2018 it replaced the Hyundai Tucson FCEV it was also named after Nex√∏ a city in Denmark. == History and Features == the Hyundai Nexo was revaled at the Consumer Electronics Show in 2018. and the versions Blue and Limited have ranges of 611 Km (380 Mi) and 570 Km (350 Mi) it has three fuel tanks with a capacity of 156 liters and 6.3 kg the car also have a 163 PS, 400 Nm electric motor. == Markets == The Hyundai Nexo was first released in South Korea in 2018. outside the country the Nexo is also sold in Western Europe United Kingdom Australia where it became the first hydrogen fuel cell vehicle there and Japan in the United States the car is sold only in California. == References == Nexo Category:2010s automobiles Category:2020s automobiles Category:Sport utility vehicles
title: Hyundai Nexo
